documents.document: What if we feared nothing? What if we didn't allow fear to torment us at all? What if we just did what we needed to do with no hesitation?
Seek clarity - ask questions - never assume.
I found this on Pinterest! https://t.co/gb8QyUB7nv

More education = More power
Be simple + Be grateful = Happiness

I love to learn and my learning will never end #allforthekids....

Let patience have its perfect work...James 1:4
Words to live by: Love, Forgive and Serve.
Say YES to GOD and see all that GOD will do in you and in your life!
I am a great SAVAGE.
I'm not obsessed with money, I'm obsessed with freedom.
No matter what - remain positive.
Twitter is one of my thought journals......
I don't have regrets - just great lessons.
I'm building an empire and it won't be easy.....

Enjoy every moment of your life - it is so short.
Speak excellent and extraordinary things over you and those you love DAILY.
GOD love + self-love - are the best kinds of love....
I blame it on me - its my fault. I did it so I can correct it.
She's: a black queen, brilliant, wise, forgiving, learning to let of offenses quickly, self-educated, self-motivated, driven, ambitious and loves the children.....
Life is nothing without love + forgiveness + fun......
My LIFE: God, Me, Family, Friends, Legacy, Bless!
You are worthy of all that is awaiting you...walk through the doors proudly.
We all have multiple talents....
RT @LV_Sports: Accept responsibility for the good and the bad. https://t.co/8CbDCV0S9l
All I see are my dreams as true....
Imagine only good things happening to you, over and over again.
Fear is torment.
I fear - fear.
When they go low - always go high......
I am grateful for: love, the light, truth, freedom, salvation, my dreams, my hopes, the children, the ability to see, hear, smell and touch.....
I never stop imagining myself winning.
Just love them more. When they hate you, love them more. When they say mean things, love them more.

RT @Quote_Soup: Do what you feel in your heart to be right - for you'll be criticized anyway. -Eleanor Roosevelt
I'm into this minimalist lifestyle..... Wanting less and less.
Your flaws don't define you as a person - they show your humanity.
You are brilliant - and don't ever forget it.
There is something liberating in not being offended by the things said and done to you. Feel it but don't let the offense mess up your moment and life.
I don't aspire to be wealthy - I aspire to make my children wealthy.
What I see, others don't see and there is something magical in that......
I am grateful for a love that is so unconditional and so forgiving of me and my flaws.
GOD is LOVE - and we show the world GOD by loving others well.
I believe in speaking things into existence.
Action kills all fear!
The heavens never want you to FEAR - fear is tormenting. Just think about it.
May the student in us - never die.
We must teach our children to have their own business alongside their job - they quit their job when their business can sustain their lifestyle.
We must teach children at age 5 to start their own business.
Wealth is mine - but it will be given to the children.
Don't worry about things you cannot control.
Happiness is your responsibility. I mean known else knows you that well.....
Take the limits off so faith cam make you fly.....
A changed perspective can lead to a changed life....
We must decide to take the limits off -
I hate being afraid to do something -- thank you Will Smith
I think Tiffany Haddish is so dope - she's so down to earth, honest and funny on so many levels....Hollywood not ready for you, but you are surely ready for Hollywood!
